alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Pike (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 8:09PM CST until further notice by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... Illinois River at Valley City. Illinois River at La Grange LD. Illinois River at Meredosia. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Illinois River at Meredosia. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, City of Meredosia plugs storm sewer outlets. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Saturday the stage was 14.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday evening and continue rising to 18.7 feet Friday evening. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Illinois River Meredosia 17.0 14.4 15.2 15.8 16.5 17.4 18.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
